title: WTB: Cobb American Beauty 460 and Soveriegn 460

posts.post_title: WTB: Cobb American Beauty 460 and Soveriegn 460
posts.post_content:
I am looking to buy a low grade Cobb in American Beauty 460 or Soveriegn 460.

If you have one for sale please message me.

Thanks

I did see that thread. My understanding was that he is not ready to sell it.

Granted I did not ask. Maybe I will do so.
